detail_desc: Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Shirt jacket in twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved football shirt in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with press-studs at the back.
Fitted vest top in microfibre. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Slides in imitation suede with crossover straps. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.

Shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication, and a gathered seam at the hem. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Fitted,off-the-shoulder mesh top with decorative gathers at the front and long sleeves. Jersey lining front and back.

Calf-length dress in a crisp cotton weave with a square neckline, smocking at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with covered elastication at the shoulders and hems, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.

V-neck blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a drawstring and decorative gathers at the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a seam at the hem with a flounce that is slightly shorter at the front.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Jacket in woven fabric containing glittery threads with long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Hoodie in soft pile with appliqués on the hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, tie belt and side pockets. Extra soft, brushed inside.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in airy linen with a sweetheart neckline, flounced, elastic shoulder straps and a smocked back.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and a collar with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Lightly padded bomber jacket with a lined, detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fitted strappy top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Padded footmuff in woven fabric. Elasticated hood with ear-shaped appliqués on top, concealed zips down the front and padded cuffs that can be folded over to keep the hands warm. Fleece lining.
Airy, pattern-weave blouse with a pussy-bow collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline, visible seam at the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Long opening down the back with a drawstring at the waist and a gently flared, bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in a textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a press-stud.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in soft jersey with a washed look. Visible seams and long sleeves with cut-out sections at the elbows.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Pyjamas with a jersey T-shirt top and woven bottoms. T-shirt with a woven chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.
V-neck tunic in an airy weave with a stand-up collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a decorative bow at the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey with studs around the neckline and sleeves, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in the side, side pockets and slim, ankle-length legs.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Jacket in soft pile with a jersey-lined stand-up collar, zip down the front and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and long sleeves. Opening at the back with a concealed zip at the bottom and a concealed button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a fitted skirt.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with press-studs, a zip down the front and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective print motifs and long, double sleeves in a contrasting colour. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Satin top with lace, super-skinny, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric. Narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps, a small frill trim around the neckline and gathered seams creating tiers in the skirt for added volume. Lined.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Patterned bikini. Top with a lined front and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back. Fully lined bottoms with a flounce at the top.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers in soft fabric. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
Knee-length cargo shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, and flap leg and back pockets with a concealed hook and loop fastening.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, long sleeves and an elastic hem with a text print.
Mug in transparent printed plastic with a screw top and straw. Diameter at the top 10 cm, height 15.5 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing with an overlocked edge at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Mittens in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Fleece lining.

Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with plumeti. Round neck and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with smocked frill trims. Skirt with gathered tiers for added width. V-neck inner dress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Round-necked, straight-cut T-shirt in soft premium cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Bucket hat in woven fabric. Width of brim approx. 6 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton with contrasting colour panels along the shoulders and sleeves.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly with a button and kickflare legs.
Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, short, gently flared sleeves and smocking at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Baby Exclusive. Puff pants in airy organic cotton chambray with smocking and a frill trim at the waist and narrow elastication and a frill trim around the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with earflaps and ties under the chin.
Metal hoop earrings. Diameter 6 cm.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a T-shirt and skirt in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim. Skirt with an all-over print, elastication and a frill trim at the waist, and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Fisherman’s hat in a cotton weave. Width of brim 8.5 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a pair of dungaree shorts and a T-shirt in soft, organic cotton. Shorts in a crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waist and hems and straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Soft cotton poplin lining. T-shirt in ribbed jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
